title: Wow!! 3 bed 2 full bath ; private balcony!! Rent Today!!
posting_body: This unit is available for Today move in and it's located on the top floor of a multi level family building (2 flights of stairs up).

Walk into a spacious common area with stainless steel appliances inclusive of a dishwasher, super high ceilings, both bathrooms have deep soaking tubs, 2 of the bedrooms fit queen/king sized beds and the last a full comfortably with extra furnishings.
The master bedroom has a double door closet, balcony and en suite bathroom.
